column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Our main dishes were "protein pancakes" and the "fruity pebble French toast" both presentions were appealing
column2: they accidentally served me the bacon sprinkles on top after I asked for no meat to be served on my plate. Shortly after I asked for a second mimosa which was then very watered down and distasteful
column3: I asked for another the waitress shortly returned with a new one.
